refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: irk is a simple test program for irkerd8. It will construct a simple JSON object and pass it to the daemon running on localhost.

listitem.para: Which server and channel to join to announced the message. If not prefixed with "irc:", it will prefix "irc://chat.freenode.net/" to the argument before passing it directly to irkerd. This argument is passed as the "to" parameter in the JSON object.
Which message to send to the target specified above. If the string "-", the message will be read from standard input, with newlines stripped.

refsect1.title: LIMITATIONS
refsect1.para: irk has no commandline usage and may be riddled with bugs.
irk doesn't know how to talk to your favorite VCS. You will generally want to use irkerhook1 instead
irk has also all the limitations of irkerd.
